item.title: npm最佳实践
item.description: 发布到私有仓库 package.json 配置 directories.bin 指定bin的目录 directories.lib 指定bin的lib位置 package.json的内容中 { //指定发布仓库 "publishConfig": { "registry": "https://registry.npmjs.org/" }, //指定引擎版本 "engines": { "node": ">= 8.0.0", "npm": ">= 5.0.0" }, //依赖有多种指定方式,可以是git，也可以是gz,也可以是本地路径 "dependencies": { "local": "file://Users/xiaoming/example.gz", "example": "http://w.cc/visionmedia/example.gz", "express": "git://w.cc/visionmedia/express", "b":"git+ssh://user@hostname:project.git#commit-ish", "c":"git+https://user@hostname:project.git#commit-ish", "mocha": "visionmedia/mocha#4727d357ea" } }
